crypto.name: Custom ECB Cipher
crypto.desc: I have designed a simple algorithm which I believe it's secure. I am confident you cannot compromise my message with the x value.

crypto.name: Keyboard Cipher
crypto.desc: I designed an algorithm to encrypt a message using my keyboard. No one can decrypt it without any information about my algorithm. Note: Wrap the flag in TUCTF{}.

crypto.name: Simple Cipher
crypto.desc: I made my own encryption algorithm, surely it is secure! I even made sure to redact the important parts!

crypto.name: Table Encryption
crypto.desc: You can't crack my file! I am the exclusive owner of the encryption key!

forensic.name: Free Proxy
forensic.desc: We do not like running servers for our customers so we have outsourced the work to random people on the internet! Can you proxy our connections please?

forensic.name: State of the Git
forensic.desc: All the cool kids are embracing state of the art IAC technology, and we are rushing to catch up! We have a new system that we are testing out, but we are not sure how secure it is. Can you check it out for us?

forensic.name: What Are You Doing In My Swampq
forensic.desc: This challenge is like ogres, it has layers

misc.name: A.R.K. 1
misc.desc: One sheep, two sheep, three sheep. (Note: to speed up the process, only include entries containing "sheep" in your attempts) Flag is in the format TUCTF{<password>} (don't include the brackets)

misc.name: A.R.K. 2
misc.desc: Woof woof bark bark (Note: to speed up the process, only include entries containing "dog" in your attempts)

misc.name: A.R.K. 3
misc.desc: Meowdy. (Note: to speed up the process, only include entries containing "meow" in your attempts)

misc.name: A R K 1
misc.desc: One sheep, two sheep, three sheep. (Note: to speed up the process, only include entries containing "sheep" in your attempts) Flag is in the format TUCTF{<password>} (don't include the brackets)

programming.name: Bludgeon the Booty
programming.desc:
You have found me treasure chest, but can you crack its code?

  ___________
 /           \
/__|0|0|0|0|__\
|      @      |
|_____________|

"This here lock be cursed by the shaman of the swamp to change keys for each attempt"

programming.name: CaRLsLabrinth
programming.desc: CaRL has gone and trapped you in his corn maze with a blindfold on. Every time you take a step CaRL throws a banana at you and it is a little annoying. What is more annoying is that when you run off the path into the corn, CaRL throws a handful of tomatos at you and makes you restart at 0! You know there is a fresh apple pie at the end of the maze but can you get there? It's always been your policy to never give up!

programming.name: Cube 2023
programming.desc:
UPDATE: the Cube has been downsized to 6x6x6 for better performance

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2o3Lgx_HSRQ

programming.name: Plenty O Fish in the Sea
programming.desc: You have embarked on a quest to find the One Bit! Your first step is to find the scattered pieces of the treasure map on this here abandoned island!

pwn.name: Hidden Value
pwn.desc: There's a hidden value in this program, can you find it?

rev.name: Electric Byte
rev.desc:
I made a special application to help me with my web development!

File: https://tuctf23-large-files.sfo3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/electric-byte.exe

rev.name: Java Juggling
rev.desc: There is an existential crisis in my java program. Can you help me find the flag?

rev.name: Jmpfuscator
rev.desc: Can you follow the white rabbit?

rev.name: Try Debug Me
rev.desc: I dare you to try and debug my program. I bet you can't find the flag!

web.name: Aspiring Calculator
web.desc: This is my first time programming a web calculator. I hope it works!
